languages.text: Дворец губернатора выглядит роскошно: позолоту и штукатурку, похоже, обновляют регулярно и часто — слишком часто даже для здания на морском побережье.
The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.
languages.original_text: Дворец губернатора выглядит роскошно: позолоту и штукатурку, похоже, обновляют регулярно и часто — слишком часто даже для здания на морском побережье.

traits.locale_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.
The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.
The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.
The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

languages.text: 総督の宮殿は豪勢だ。金箔の張り替えと漆喰の塗り替えが頻繁かつ定期的に行われているようだ。海岸の屋敷とはいえ、やり過ぎなほどだ。
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: 総督の宮殿は豪勢だ。金箔の張り替えと漆喰の塗り替えが頻繁かつ定期的に行われているようだ。海岸の屋敷とはいえ、やり過ぎなほどだ。

languages.text: 总督的宫殿富丽堂皇，镀金饰面和灰泥似乎会频繁地定期翻新。即便是对位于海岸边的建筑而言，这样的翻新也实在是太频繁了。
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: 总督的宫殿富丽堂皇，镀金饰面和灰泥似乎会频繁地定期翻新。即便是对位于海岸边的建筑而言，这样的翻新也实在是太频繁了。

languages.text: El palacio de la gobernadora es opulento: el baño de oro y el yeso se repasan con frecuencia, parece... con demasiada frecuencia incluso para un edificio costero.
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: El palacio de la gobernadora es opulento: el baño de oro y el yeso se repasan con frecuencia, parece... con demasiada frecuencia incluso para un edificio costero.

languages.text: Der Palast der Gouverneurin ist opulent: Vergoldungen und Stuck werden anscheinend regelmäßig und häufig erneuert – zu häufig, selbst wenn das Gebäude an der Küste liegt.
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: Der Palast der Gouverneurin ist opulent: Vergoldungen und Stuck werden anscheinend regelmäßig und häufig erneuert – zu häufig, selbst wenn das Gebäude an der Küste liegt.

languages.text: La gouverneure vit dans un palais luxueux : visiblement, le plâtre et les dorures sont refaits souvent... trop souvent, même pour un bâtiment de bord de mer.
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: La gouverneure vit dans un palais luxueux : visiblement, le plâtre et les dorures sont refaits souvent... trop souvent, même pour un bâtiment de bord de mer.

languages.text: Valinin sarayı son derece gösterişli. Yaldızlı süslemeler ve düzenlemeler devamlı olarak ve sıklıkla yenileniyor gibi görünüyor. Sahile konumlanmış bir bina için fazla sıklıkla hatta.
languages.original_text: The governor's palace is opulent: the gilt finishes and plaster are updated regularly and frequently, it seems — too frequently even for a building situated on the coast.

traits.locale_text: Valinin sarayı son derece gösterişli. Yaldızlı süslemeler ve düzenlemeler devamlı olarak ve sıklıkla yenileniyor gibi görünüyor. Sahile konumlanmış bir bina için fazla sıklıkla hatta.
